author: Reuters Editorial
title: Islamic State claims attack on police station in Indonesia: AMAQ
text:
CAIRO (Reuters) - Islamic State claims responsibility for a suicide bomb attack outside a police building in the Indonesian city of Surabaya, the Islamist militant group’s Amaq news agency said on Monday, without providing evidence.
The attack, which wounded officers and civilians, was carried out by a family of five including an eight-year-old child, riding on motorbikes.
Reporting by Ahmed Tolba; Writing by Eric Knecht; Editing by Andrew Roche
